verses.name: Jeremiah 21:8
verses.text: And unto this people thou shalt say, Thus saith the Lord; Behold, I set before you the way of life, and the way of death.

verses.name: Jeremiah 21:9
verses.text: He that abideth in this city shall die by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence: but he that goeth out, and falleth to the Chaldeans that besiege you, he shall live, and his life shall be unto him for a prey.
